ingredients: 1 package fajita seasoning mix (I used low sodium Ol El Paso), plus ¼ cup of water
¼ teaspoon salt (or to taste, depends if you use low sodium beans or not)
1 19oz can black beans, rinsed and drained (about 2 cups cooked)
juice of ½ of a lime
shredded cheddar or mexican blend cheese, about 2 cups
